source_note: Baseline from Kentucky Division of Waste Management and major municipal programs; local rules may vary.

organics.guidance: Yard/food waste composting encouraged; not mandated statewide.
organics.bin: Green/yard waste cart or compost drop-off where offered.
organics.notes: Availability varies by city (e.g., Lexington yard waste collection).

paper_cardboard.guidance: Recycle clean, dry paper and cardboard; flatten boxes.
paper_cardboard.bin: Blue/mixed recycling bin or drop-off center.

glass_containers.guidance: Bottles and jars only; rinse and remove lids.
glass_containers.bin: Separate glass bin or drop-off if accepted.
glass_containers.notes: Not all curbside programs take glass.

metal_containers.guidance: Aluminum and steel/tin cans, empty and rinsed.

plastics.notes: No film, bags, or foam curbside.

household_batteries.guidance: Recycle rechargeables/lead-acid via HHW or retailers.
household_batteries.notes: Keep batteries out of trash and blue bins.

e_waste.guidance: Use e-waste events or recyclers; not mandated statewide.

bulky_items.guidance: Schedule special pickup or take to transfer station/landfill.
bulky_items.notes: Fees and limits vary by locality.
provenance: Local solid waste program rules in KY
